mapper.select: SELECT ev.event_Id, ev.event_Name, ev.event_Date, ev.cat_Id, oc.res_Id, oc.res_Name, oc.res_Coef, oc.event_Id, oc.res_state FROM event ev LEFT JOIN outcome oc ON ev.event_Id = oc.event_Id

SELECT ev.event_Id, ev.event_Name, ev.event_Date, ev.cat_Id, oc.res_Id, oc.res_Name, oc.res_Coef, oc.event_Id, oc.res_state FROM event ev LEFT JOIN outcome oc ON ev.event_Id = oc.event_Id WHERE ev.event_Id = ${id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event (event_Name, event_Date, cat_Id) VALUES (#{name},#{date},#{idCategory})
mapper.update: UPDATE event SET event_Name = #{name}, event_Date= #{date}, cat_Id = #{idCategory} WHERE event_Id = #{id}
